array.name: desc
array.item: The speaker, with articulate expression and compelling delivery, captivates the audience with insightful perspectives and a commanding presence.
The laptop is a portable computer that combines sleek design with powerful functionality for on-the-go computing.
A mobile is a handheld device that enables communication, internet access, and various applications in a compact and portable form.
A desktop is a stationary computer system with a separate monitor, keyboard, and processing unit designed for robust computing tasks.
A mouse is a small handheld device used to navigate and interact with a computer interface by moving the cursor on a screen.
